title: [K-12] Short-Intensive Course on Utilizing SMS-Based Mathematics Formative Assessment Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Operations and Understanding of Function Concepts
context.additional_context: Immediate feedback provided through SMS-based quizzes linked to real-time lectures. Mobile device usage is mandatory.

learning_goals: Learners solve math problems delivered via SMS with 80% accuracy within 10 minutes.
Learners supplement weak concepts within 24 hours based on SMS quiz results.
Learners achieve over 90% participation in weekly SMS quizzes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
